title: Project Tiger Conservation Grant
description: Funding to support tiger conservation in national parks, focusing on habitat restoration and anti-poaching.
eligibility: Registered NGOs and state forest departments with tiger reserves.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Project Elephant Habitat Protection Grant
description: Grant to protect elephant corridors and reduce human-elephant conflicts.
eligibility: State wildlife departments and conservation NGOs in elephant-prone regions.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Snow Leopard Conservation Fund
description: Funding to preserve snow leopard habitats in the Himalayas.
eligibility: NGOs and research institutions in Himalayan states.

title: Ganges River Dolphin Preservation Grant
description: Support for protecting Ganges River Dolphins through habitat restoration.
eligibility: Environmental NGOs in Uttar Pradesh and Bihar.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Hangul Recovery Program Grant
description: Funding to recover the Kashmir stag population in Dachigam National Park.
eligibility: Jammu & Kashmir wildlife authorities and NGOs.

title: Vulture Conservation Initiative Grant
description: Grant to protect vulture populations through breeding and habitat management.
eligibility: NGOs in Punjab, Haryana, and Gujarat.

title: Indian Rhino Vision 2020 Extension Grant
description: Funding to continue conservation of the greater one-horned rhinoceros in Assam.
source: Department of Environment and Forests, Assam

title: Olive Ridley Turtle Protection Grant
description: Support for protecting Olive Ridley turtles along the Odisha coast.

title: Sundarbans Tiger Reserve Grant
description: Funding to enhance conservation in the Sundarbans for tigers and biodiversity.
eligibility: West Bengal Forest Department and NGOs.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: National River Conservation Plan Grant
description: Grant to prevent river pollution and protect aquatic wildlife.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Wildlife Habitat Development Grant
description: Funding for developing wildlife habitats in national parks.

title: Forest Restoration and Afforestation Grant
description: Support for reforestation to protect forest animal habitats.
eligibility: State forest departments and community organizations.

title: Sangai Deer Conservation Grant
description: Funding to protect the endangered Sangai deer in Manipur.

title: Nilgiri Tahr Recovery Grant
description: Grant to recover Nilgiri Tahr populations in the Western Ghats.
eligibility: Tamil Nadu Wildlife Department and NGOs.

title: Swiftlet Conservation Fund
description: Support for protecting edible-nest swiftlets in Andaman & Nicobar.
eligibility: Andaman & Nicobar Forest Department and institutes.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Crocodile Conservation Project Grant
description: Funding to conserve crocodile species in Indian rivers and wetlands.
eligibility: Wildlife NGOs and state wetland authorities.

title: Bird Habitat Restoration Grant
description: Grant to restore habitats for threatened bird species.

title: Mangrove Ecosystem Protection Grant
description: Funding to protect mangrove ecosystems supporting forest animals.

title: Leopard Habitat Enhancement Grant
description: Support for enhancing leopard habitats and reducing conflicts.

title: Wetland Conservation Grant
description: Funding to conserve wetlands for migratory birds and aquatic animals.
source: National Plan for Conservation of Aquatic Eco-System

title: Forest Fire Prevention Grant
description: Grant to prevent forest fires and protect animal habitats.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Wildlife Corridor Development Grant
description: Funding to develop wildlife corridors for forest animals.

title: Tiger Prey Base Enhancement Grant
description: Support for enhancing prey populations for tiger conservation.

title: Endangered Species Recovery Grant
description: Funding to recover species like the Asiatic lion.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Aquatic Ecosystem Restoration Grant
description: Grant to restore aquatic ecosystems for forest animals.

title: Himalayan Biodiversity Grant
description: Funding to protect biodiversity in Himalayan forests.

title: Wildlife Anti-Poaching Grant
description: Support for anti-poaching patrols in protected areas.
eligibility: Wildlife Crime Control Bureau and police.

title: Forest Community Engagement Grant
description: Funding to engage communities in wildlife conservation.

title: Lion Conservation Fund
description: Grant to protect Asiatic lions in Gir Forest.

title: Bird Migration Protection Grant
description: Support for protecting migratory bird habitats.

title: Forest Research and Monitoring Grant
description: Funding for research on forest animal populations.
source: Indian Council of Forestry Research and Education

title: Wildlife Health Management Grant
description: Grant to manage wildlife health and disease surveillance.

title: Coastal Forest Protection Grant
description: Support for protecting coastal forests and wildlife.

title: Tiger Reserve Infrastructure Grant
description: Funding to improve infrastructure in tiger reserves.

title: Forest Biodiversity Survey Grant
description: Grant to conduct biodiversity surveys in forests.

title: Wildlife Education and Awareness Grant
description: Support for educating communities about conservation.

title: Elephant Task Force Grant
description: Funding to reduce human-elephant conflict.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Forest Carbon Sequestration Grant
description: Support for forest projects that sequester carbon.
eligibility: State forest departments and climate NGOs.

title: Wildlife Rescue and Rehabilitation Grant
description: Funding to rescue and rehabilitate injured animals.
eligibility: Wildlife rescue NGOs and veterinary services.

title: River Dolphin Monitoring Grant
description: Grant to monitor and protect river dolphin populations.
eligibility: Research institutes and river conservation groups.

title: Forest Patrol and Surveillance Grant
description: Support for patrolling to prevent poaching.

title: Endangered Bird Breeding Grant
description: Funding to establish breeding programs for birds.

title: Forest Ecosystem Restoration Grant
description: Grant to restore degraded forest ecosystems.

title: Wildlife Conflict Mitigation Grant
description: Support to mitigate human-wildlife conflicts.
source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change

title: Tiger Population Census Grant
description: Funding to conduct tiger population censuses.
eligibility: Wildlife Institute of India and forest departments.

title: Forest Animal Health Grant
description: Grant to improve health services for forest animals.

title: Coastal Wildlife Protection Grant
description: Support for protecting wildlife in coastal forests.

title: Forest Species Reintroduction Grant
description: Funding to reintroduce endangered species into forests.
eligibility: Wildlife Institute of India and state departments.

title: Wildlife Tourism Development Grant
description: Support for sustainable wildlife tourism to fund conservation.
eligibility: National park authorities and tourism NGOs.

title: Forest Water Conservation Grant
description: Grant to conserve water sources in forest ecosystems.
eligibility: State forest departments and water NGOs.

title: Bear Habitat Restoration Grant
description: Funding to restore habitats for sloth bears in central India.
eligibility: Madhya Pradesh Forest Department and NGOs.

title: Deer Population Recovery Grant
description: Support for recovering deer populations in northern forests.
